Package no.ntnu.idatt1005.foodi.model.daos

Class IngredientDao

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1005.foodi.model.daos.IngredientDao
public class IngredientDao extends Object
This class is responsible for handling the interaction between the Ingredient class and the Database.
Version:
0.9.0
Author:
Snake727

    • countIngredientItemsInUserInventory

      public int countIngredientItemsInUserInventory(int userId)
      Counts the number of ingredient items in a user's inventory.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user to count the ingredients from.
      Returns:
      the number of ingredient items in the user's inventory.

    • saveIngredientToRecipe

      public void saveIngredientToRecipe(int recipeId, int ingredientId, double amount)
      Saves an ingredient to a recipe. This is done by inserting the recipe id, ingredient id and amount into the recipe_ingredient table.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - The id of the recipe to save the ingredient to.
      ingredientId - The id of the ingredient to save.
      amount - The amount of the ingredient to save.

    • saveIngredientObject

      public void saveIngredientObject(@NotNull @NotNull Ingredient obj)
      Saves an ingredient object to the database.
      Parameters:
      obj - The ingredient object to save.

    • saveIngredientToUserInventory

      public void saveIngredientToUserInventory(int userId, String ingredientName, Ingredient.Unit unit, Ingredient.Category category, double amount, @Nullable @Nullable Date expirationDate)
      Saves an ingredient to a user's inventory.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user to save the ingredient to.
      ingredientName - The name of the ingredient to save.
      unit - The unit of the ingredient to save.
      category - The category of the ingredient to save.
      amount - The amount of the ingredient to save.
      expirationDate - The expiration date of the ingredient.

    • findIngredientId

      private static Integer findIngredientId(@NotNull @NotNull String ingredientName, @NotNull Ingredient.Unit unit, @NotNull Ingredient.Category category)
      Finds the id of an ingredient in the database.
      Parameters:
      ingredientName - The name of the ingredient to find.
      unit - The unit of the ingredient to find.
      category - The category of the ingredient to find.
      Returns:
      The id of the ingredient. Returns -1 if nothing was found.

    • saveIngredient

      public void saveIngredient(@NotNull @NotNull String ingredientName, @NotNull Ingredient.Unit unit, @NotNull Ingredient.Category category)
      Saves an ingredient to the database. This is done by inserting the name, unit and category into the ingredient table.
      Parameters:
      ingredientName - The name of the ingredient to save.
      unit - The unit of the ingredient to save.
      category - The category of the ingredient to save.

    • mergeIngredient

      public void mergeIngredient(int id, @NotNull @NotNull String ingredientName, @NotNull Ingredient.Unit unit, @NotNull Ingredient.Category category)
      Merges an ingredient object into the database. If the ingredient already exists, it will be updated. If not, it will be inserted.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the ingredient to merge.
      ingredientName - The name of the ingredient to merge.
      unit - The unit of the ingredient to merge.
      category - The category of the ingredient to merge.

    • updateIngredient

      private void updateIngredient(@NotNull @NotNull Ingredient obj)
      Updates an ingredient object in the database.
      Parameters:
      obj - The ingredient object to update.

    • updateIngredientInUserInventory

      public void updateIngredientInUserInventory(int ingredientId, double amount, @NotNull @NotNull LocalDate expirationDate)
      Updates an ingredient in a user's inventory.
      Parameters:
      ingredientId - The id of the ingredient to update.
      amount - The new amount of the ingredient.
      expirationDate - The new expiration date of the ingredient.

    • updateItemAmountInUserInventory

      public void updateItemAmountInUserInventory(int userId, int itemId, double amount)
      Updates the amount of an ingredient in a user's inventory.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user to update the ingredient in.
      itemId - The id of the ingredient to update.
      amount - The new amount of the ingredient.

      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user to update the ingredient in.
      ingredientId - The id of the ingredient to update.
      expirationDate - The new expiration date of the ingredient.

    • deleteIngredientObject

      public void deleteIngredientObject(@NotNull @NotNull Ingredient obj)
      Deletes an ingredient object from the database and also deletes related entries in the inventory table.
      Parameters:
      obj - The ingredient object to delete.

    • deleteIngredientFromUserInventory

      public void deleteIngredientFromUserInventory(int userId, int ingredientId)
      Deletes an ingredient from a user's inventory.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user to delete the ingredient from.
      ingredientId - The id of the ingredient to delete.

    • retrieveIngredientObject

      @Nullable public @Nullable Ingredient retrieveIngredientObject(@NotNull @NotNull Ingredient obj)
      Retrieves an ingredient object from the database.
      Parameters:
      obj - The ingredient object to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Ingredient object. Returns null if nothing was found.

    • retrieveAmountedIngredientsFromRecipe

      @Nullable public @Nullable List<AmountedIngredient> retrieveAmountedIngredientsFromRecipe(int recipeId)
      Retrieves all ingredients and their amounts in a recipe. This is done by checking the recipe table for a matching recipe id.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - The id of the recipe to retrieve ingredients from.
      Returns:
      The Ingredient object. Returns null if nothing was found.

    • retrieveAmountedIngredientsFromInventory

      @Nullable public @Nullable List<AmountedIngredient> retrieveAmountedIngredientsFromInventory(int userId)
      Retrieve a list of all the ingredients in a users inventory. The list contains AmountedIngredient objects with the amount of each ingredient.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user to retrieve the inventory from.
      Returns:
      A list of AmountedIngredient objects.

    • retrieveIngredientById

      @Nullable public @Nullable Ingredient retrieveIngredientById(int id)
      Retrieve an ingredient from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the ingredient to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Ingredient object. Returns null if nothing was found.

    • retrieveExpiringIngredientsFromInventory

      @Nullable public @Nullable List<ExpiringIngredient> retrieveExpiringIngredientsFromInventory(int userId)
      Retrieve a list of all the ingredients in a users inventory. The list contains ExpiringIngredient objects with the amount and expiration date of each ingredient.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user to retrieve the inventory from.
      Returns:
      A list of ExpiringIngredient objects.

    • toggleFreezeIngredient

      public void toggleFreezeIngredient(int userId, int ingredientId, boolean isFrozen)
      Freezes or unfreezes an ingredient in a user's inventory.
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user to freeze the ingredient for.
      ingredientId - The id of the ingredient to freeze.
      isFrozen - True if the ingredient should be frozen, false if it should be unfrozen.
